DPQ010.text: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems: little interest or pleasure in doing things? Would you say...

DPQ060.label: Feeling bad about yourself
DPQ060.text: [Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:] feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?

DPQ080.label: Moving or speaking slowly or too fast
